product_name: Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 Wash-In Water Repellent Treatment - 10 oz.
long_description: Restore water repellency to your rainwear with Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 wash-in water repellent treatment. Unlike spray-on treatments, wash-in application ensures that the entire garment is thoroughly coated for optimal performance. A single treatment lasts through several future washings. Washing machine safe; one 10 ounce bottle is enough to treat several garments. Manufacturer recommends cleaning garment prior to treatment. Safe for use on Gore-Tex(R), REI Elements(R), Ultrex(R), Entrant(R), SympaTex(R) and eVent(R) laminate fabrics.
short_description: Restore water repellency to your rainwear with Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 wash-in water repellent treatment.
